comments.en: Seperately exchangable tanks for each colour

Similar printer to the Xerox DocuPrint M760, the printer probably does up to 1200 dpi, but the drivers shown here do only 600 dpi.

The Sharp AJ-1800/1805/2000/2005 and the Xerox DocuPrint M750/M760 are very similar and can all be used with the same drivers. For how to get the best out of these printers, see the page of the Sharp AJ-2000.
